title: The Trojan Horse Affair - Part 2
description: Hamza and Brian think the source of the Trojan Horse letter might be hiding in plain sight. After learning about the petty personnel dispute that probably gave rise to the letter, they’re even more bewildered about how it ever could have been taken seriously.
author: rich@thislife.org (Serial Productions & The New York Times)
